com.aj.android.commons.io

Class StreamUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aj.android.commons.io.StreamUtils

  • public class StreamUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of common method for reading, writing and transforming byte-streams to and fro.
    Author:
    Akhil Jain

      • getBytesFromFile

        public static byte[] getBytesFromFile(java.lang.String filePath)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Get byte array of content present in the given file path.

        The file content should be less than Integer.MAX_VALUE,
        Array indexing cannot be more than maximum value of int / Integer.
        Parameters:
        filePath - -String Physical file system absolute path for file.
        Returns:
        byte[] -contents of array in byte form.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any String parameter is empty or null.

        Converts given InputStream to String, using BufferedReader with buffer size of 4KB.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - -InputStream which needs to be converted.
        Returns:
        String -converted from given InputStream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • copy

        public static long copy(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                        java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copy from one stream to another stream.

        1. Internally calls copyLarge(InputStream, OutputStream, byte[]).
        2. Buffer size used when reading is 4KB.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - -Source InputStream.
        outputStream - -Destination OutputStream.
        Returns:
        long -no of bytes copy from source to destination stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • copyLarge

        public static long copyLarge(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                             java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Copy from one stream to another stream.

        1. Internally calls copyLarge(InputStream, OutputStream, byte[]).
        2. Buffer size used when reading is 8KB.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - -Source InputStream.
        outputStream - -Destination OutputStream.
        Returns:
        long -no of bytes copy from source to destination stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • copyLarge

        public static long copyLarge(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                             java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                             byte[] bytes)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Copy from one stream to another stream based on provided byte array.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - -Source InputStream.
        outputStream - -Destination OutputStream.
        bytes - - byte array buffer size, specifying how much byte to read each time.
        Returns:
        long -no of bytes copy from source to destination stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
